section.title: Document Information
section.para: This document provides information on the new user experience that offers to Lending Services corporate users in 6.0.2.0 and later versions. The new product and its menus are built using Angular. consists of a set of modules (or functions) giving the corporate user online access to various Lending services offered by the bank.
The chapter introduces the web interface of .

note.para: The availability of the menus and functions described in this document is dependent on the permissions assigned. Only those functions that you are authorized to use are available.
